title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

To earn the first point, a response must communicate the use of t=2. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyypa0 JaaGOmaiaac6caaaa@3C68@

  • A response that presents a correct expression for speed in terms of with an incorrect or missing answer does not earn either point. For example, a response of just Speed= x ′ t 2 + y ′ t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGtbGaaeiCai aabwgacaqGLbGaaeizaiabg2da9maakaaabaWaaeWaaeaaceWG4bGb auaadaqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaada ahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGHRaWkdaqadaqaaiqadMhagaqbamaa bmaabaGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaale qabaGaaGOmaaaaaeqaaaaa@4B77@ does not earn either point.

A response that presents a correct expression for speed in terms of t with a correct answer, and provides correct communication, earns both points. For example, a response of Speed= x ′ t 2 + y ′ t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGtbGaaeiCai aabwgacaqGLbGaaeizaiabg2da9maakaaabaWaaeWaaeaaceWG4bGb auaadaqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaada ahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGHRaWkdaqadaqaaiqadMhagaqbamaa bmaabaGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaale qabaGaaGOmaaaaaeqaaaaa@4B77@ and therefore the speed is 0.762 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlai aaiEdacaaI2aGaaGOmaaaa@3CA4@ earns both points.

A response that presents a correct expression for speed in terms of t with the correct answer, but provides incorrect or incomplete communication, does not earn the first point but earns the second point. For example, a response of Speed= x ′   t 2 + y ′   t 2 =0.762 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGtbGaaeiCai aabwgacaqGLbGaaeizaiabg2da9maakaaabaWaaeWaaeaaceWG4bGb auaacaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaaacaGLOaGaay zkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSYaaeWaaeGabaq7biqa dMhagaqbaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaiaawI cacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaabeaakiabg2da9iaaicda caGGUaGaaG4naiaaiAdacaaIYaaaaa@5443@ does not earn the first point but earns the second point.

An unsupported answer of 0.762 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlai aaiEdacaaI2aGaaGOmaaaa@3CA4@ does not earn either point.

The exact answer is 1−sin 2 2 + sin 4 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aakaaapaqaa8qadaqadaqaaiaaigdacqGHsislciGGZbGaaiyAaiaa c6gadaqadaqaaiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaapa WaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRmaabmaabaGaci4Caiaa cMgacaGGUbWaaeWaaeaacaaI0aaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaacaGLOaGaay zkaaWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaikdaaaaabeaakiaac6caaaa@4BF7@ This earns both points.

A response that presents an incorrect expression for x ′ t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWG4bGbauaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbmaabmaabaGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3CA6@ is eligible for the first point only.

Degree mode: A response that presents answers obtained by using a calculator in degree mode does not earn the first point it would have otherwise earned. The response is generally eligible for all subsequent points (unless no answer is possible in degree mode or the question is made simpler by using degree mode). In degree mode, x ′   2 2 + y ′   2 2 =0.967618 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaGcaaqaamaabm aabaGabmiEayaafaGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawMca aaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRmaabm aabaGabmyEayaafaGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawMca aaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaeqaaOGaeyypa0 JaaGimaiaac6cacaaI5aGaaGOnaiaaiEdacaaI2aGaaGymaiaaiIda aaa@4F96@ or 1.001822. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaiOlai aaicdacaaIWaGaaGymaiaaiIdacaaIYaGaaGOmaiaac6caaaa@3F83@

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

  • The first point is earned for presenting the correct integrand in a definite integral, with correct or incorrect limits.

  • To earn the second point, a response must have earned the first point, must display correct limits, and must present the value 7.638. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI3aGaaiOlai aaiAdacaaIZaGaaGioaiaac6caaaa@3D5F@

  • An unsupported answer of 7.638. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI3aGaaiOlai aaiAdacaaIZaGaaGioaiaac6caaaa@3D5F@ does not earn either point.

  • A response that imports an incorrect expression for x ′   t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWG4bGbauaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3E37@ from part (a) is eligible for the first point only.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

A response that writes a linear equation using a slope of – 0.775 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aacobicaaMi8UaaGimaiaac6cacaaI3aGaaG4naiaaiwdaaaa@3F0F@ earns the first point.

A response that writes a correct tangent line equation, in any form, earns both points.

  • Note: The slope-intercept form is y=− 0.775x+9.395 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaeyypa0 JaeyOeI0IaaGjcVlaaicdacaGGUaGaaG4naiaaiEdacaaI1aGaamiE aiabgUcaRiaaiMdacaGGUaGaaG4maiaaiMdacaaI1aaaaa@46BD@ (or y=− 0.775x+9.394 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaeyypa0 JaeyOeI0IaaGjcVlaaicdacaGGUaGaaG4naiaaiEdacaaI1aGaamiE aiabgUcaRiaaiMdacaGGUaGaaG4maiaaiMdacaaI0aaaaa@46BC@ ).

A response that imports an incorrect expression for x ′   t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi qadIhagaqbaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3E37@ from part (a) is eligible for both points.

A response that presents an exact correct (or consistent) value of dy dx    t=6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aaeiaabaWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadsgacaWG5baapaqaa8qacaWGKbGa amiEaaaacaaMi8oacaGLiWoadaWgaaWcbaGaaGjcVlaadshacqGH9a qpcaaI2aaabeaaaaa@44D9@ earns the first point. If the exact value is simplified incorrectly, the second point is not earned.

Degree mode: In degree mode, an equation of the line tangent to the path at time t=6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyypa0 JaaGOnaaaa@3BBA@ could be one of the following:

  • y=4+0.656397 x−6.994522 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaeyypa0 JaaGinaiabgUcaRiaaicdacaGGUaGaaGOnaiaaiwdacaaI2aGaaG4m aiaaiMdacaaI3aWaaeWaaeaacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaeOnaiaab6caca qG5aGaaeyoaiaabsdacaqG1aGaaeOmaiaabkdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaa aaa@4BB8@

  • y=0.656397x−0.591183  MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aadMhacqGH9aqpcaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaiAdacaaI1aGaaGOnaiaaioda caaI5aGaaG4naiaadIhacqGHsislcaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaiwdacaaI5a GaaGymaiaaigdacaaI4aGaaG4maiaacckaaaa@49FC@

  • y=4+0.588860 x−6.994522 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaeyypa0 JaaGinaiabgUcaRiaaicdacaGGUaGaaGynaiaaiIdacaaI4aGaaGio aiaaiAdacaaIWaWaaeWaaeaacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaeOnaiaab6caca qG5aGaaeyoaiaabsdacaqG1aGaaeOmaiaabkdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaa aaa@4BB7@

  • y=0.588860x−0.118794  MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aadMhacqGH9aqpcaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaiwdacaaI4aGaaGioaiaaiIda caaI2aGaaGimaiaadIhacqGHsislcaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaigdacaaIXa GaaGioaiaaiEdacaaI5aGaaGinaiaacckaaaa@49FE@

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned by an integrand of sin t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaciGGZbGaaiyAai aac6gadaqadaqaaiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaakiaawIca caGLPaaaaaa@3F47@ in either an indefinite integral or a definite integral, with correct or incorrect limits. If the correct limits of integration are never shown, the response does not earn the third point.
